name: V_EHI_AUDIT_EPT
description: This view contains audit information for patient records for the purpose of Electronic Health Information (EHI) export. This view contains patient-level patient data.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient record that was changed.

columns.name: CHANGE_TIME
columns.description: The time the information in the record was changed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: A value needed when the item that changed was multiple response.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The value after the change, in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The value before the change, in external format. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: The value after the change, in internal format.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: The value before the change, in internal format.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The name of the Clarity table and column corresponding to the changed data.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user that made the change.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
